You push through the crowd following Rah. Where are they going? What has gotten into them? You stagger after Rah listening to the boom's and bang's from the fireworks. You follow Rah back to the docks where all of the purplesuit workers are gathering.

"They need to be... stopped..." Rah yawns.

Rah crumbles to the ground and immediately falls asleep. With the thud as Rah hits the ground the purplesuits turn to you. They are wearing monstrous industrial masks, and they begin to walk toward you.

Fight!NegotiateRun!
